item.description:
I just bought a 42 inch 1080p TV!!! Bring your own beer please, I will provide snacks and we can order pizza if you want.

Unfortunaltely I live with my Mother and Step-Father, had to move back to save some money. My mother wont be home but my stepfather will be so he might want to watch the game with us.

It's a white house with black shutters. There are two dogs at the house, don't be alarmed when you here them bark =).
item.name: Pats Game
